reviews.review: can you fix the bugs please? repeatly in and out of the game for every single strange bugs.

Bueno ya tocaba hacer el analisis, es muy buen juego recomendado. Tiene bugs, si, glitchs, si, jugadores "especiales",si, y pese a todo lo recomiendo. Por que? porque tambien tiene una excelente comunidad que me ha ayudado a entender y resolver los problemas mas frecuentes. 

Ejemplos de estos problemas:
1.- No encontrar partida rapido
     Vivo en Mexico, y digamos que no hay muchos jugadores de Dead by daylight, pues facil me cambio de region y listo. Prove España, EU - Dallas, EU - Houston, y alli si puedes jugar cuando gustes, hay partidas todo el dia. Steam >> Parametros >> Descargas >> Region de Descarga >> elige la region que mas se te acomode. Aunque debes provar tambien que tal te van las partidas por eso del lag.

2.-Bug al momento de buscar partida
El molesto bug dedarle a unirse a sala de espera y se pone la pantalla negra y palpitando el logo del juego. Bueno facil en lugar de darle en el menu principal a "Ser un superviviente" elejimos "Sobrevive con amigos" (aunque estes forever alone) y le das listo espera los 5 segundos y te buscara partida. Estos te reduce mas del 97.83% las posibilidades de que se bugueé buscando partida.

3.-Los asesinos "especiales"
Aqui van los laggers, los friendly farmers, los team Survivor-killer, los bots, los campers, los cheaters en fin todos esos jugadores profesionales que requieren que el lag, un amigo, un programa o un glitch les de una ayudadita porque no pueden con los putos noobs (como yo). Bueno en partida se van a su perfil >> amigos >> jugadores  y ven el perfil del asesino (Lo normal), la informacion que nos importa es de donde es, los vac, y los comentarios, sabiendo la region podemos deducir si tendremos lag, si tiene vac pues ya vamos viendo por donde va la tirada, y una ojeada a su muro de comentarios nos dira alguna cosilla mas, despues de la partida si llega a ser algun killer de los antes mencionados solo lo bloquean y evitamos jugar con ellos en un futuro. Si es algo de nenas todo esto, pero los friendly killers le quitan todo al juego, los laggers no te dejan hacer nada bien, los team S-k son una pesadilla por mas que trates de escapar te jodera el survivor, los campers y los cheaters son como en cualquier juego una plaga, mejor evitarlos aunque es bastante reconfortante cuando les ganas aun con todo eso.

Con estos 3 tips juego tranquilamente. Ya ustedes diran si les gusta el juego o no. A mi me encanta.
Fun concept, fun for a minute. got old fast, clunky gameplay. played on a free weekend, will not buy.

生贄生存者4人か殺人鬼1人になって対戦する鬼ごっこゲーム。
フィールドギミックを起動して逃げ出すか、
それとも殺人鬼が生存者を生贄にするか、という題材のゲームです。

しかし実はコレしばらくプレイすると生存者が攻撃側で殺人鬼が防御側なのではないかと思ってしまう。
そう、下手な殺人鬼はナメプという究極の生贄プレイをすることになるのだ！
生存者４人揃ってNDKNDKで逃げられると本当に凹みます。逆に逃げ切ると最高です。
怖いゲームのようで実は結構笑えるのかもしれません。

初心に立ち返って恐怖ドキドキゲーとして楽しむか、システムチックにゲームを楽しむのも自由だと思います。
何はともあれやり始めは凄く楽しいですよ！
生存者は出荷じゃー！

我在游戏discuss里边见到有新人不懂乱喷这款我很喜欢的游戏，我觉得有必要解释下。
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1.这个游戏的作弊检测服务器在国外，所以你不一定能连接的上，这不是游戏的问题，是GWF的原因。
 （读绿条慢、错误代码1、无法验证反作弊都是这个原因）

2.游戏时间两个小时内可以申请退款的，退款到支付宝。请百度流程

-----------------------------------------------------以上两条送新人---------------------------------------------------------------

下边是我的原评论


1.首先是不卡，因为是玩家服务器所以基本没啥需要挂vpn的问题。
2.其次游戏体验不错，优化没啥问题，我的笔记本配置很一般，但玩起来也是毫无压力。
3.bug是有，基本上可以通过重进游戏、改dns、验证游戏完整性，三个办法解决。
4.steam上也没几个联机玩起来爽的游戏，这个算一个。
5.新人确实玩起来很累（累炸了
6.如果你是在犹豫要不要买，那就买吧不用犹豫。你看看那些说不推荐的人的playtime就懂了，不好玩不会玩那么久的。
游戏是好游戏，但是制作组立志要跟玩家作对。

Дорогие разрботчики, здрасте. Итак, начнём:
Плюсы:
1. Интересный геймплей
2. Хорошая идея для игры, аля Friday 13th.
3. Ну и всё...
Минусы:
1. Что за дерьмо с серверами, ах да их нет.
2. Серверов нет, но зато их хостят игроки.
3. Очень полезная фича с хостингом кстати.
4. Пинг OVER99999.
5. Свернул, развернул - инверсия по Y
6. Закончил игру с другом, такой, думаешь сразу начать играть, а вот нет, выходи в главное меню, и запускай лобби заново.
7. Оптимизация, а точнее на что используются 8 GB оперативной памяти?

แนะนำ เลยครับ เกมนี้ ใครอยากมีเกม survival horror แบบร่วมมือกัน แบบนี้ เกมนี้ตอบโจทย์เลยครับ แถมยังมี Perk ช่วยให้ ตัวละครของเรา เก่งขึ้น มีตัวละคร ให้เลือกหลายตัว มีเสื้อ ให้เลือกเยอะ เสื้อเยอะๆนี่ อยู่ที่ การจุติ และเสื้อ ที่เขา ให้มา การจุติ ทำให้ได้ชุดเลือด และ perk ดีขึ้น แต่ ของทุกสิ่งทุกอย่าง ตอนหลัง การจุติ ก็หาย หมดเลย เขาให้แค่ เสื้อ เลือด ที่ เราได้มาจากการจุติ เกมนี้มี DLC ด้วยน่ะ มี DLC เสื้อ นี้แล้วแต่คนชอบน่ะ ว่าจะซื้อหรือ ไม่ซื้อ เพราะถ้าซื้อไป เราก็เสียตังค์ แค่ได้เสื้อมา เสื้อที่ได้ มาจาก DLC มีไม่ค่อยเยอะ แต่เสื้อ มีสีสันสวย น่ะ แต่ผมไม่ค่อย แนะนำ เพราะ เสื้อ DLC มีสีฉูดฉาด ฆาตกรเห็นง่ายเลย ผมไม่แนะนำ DLC เสื้อ ซื้อไปไม่มีอะไรดีขึ้นเลย ได้แต่เสื้อสีฉูดฉาด ฆาตกร เห็นง่าย DLC เสื้อ เป็นของ Survival เท่านั้นน่ะ มา DLC ของฆาตกรต่อ DLC ของฆาตกรจะเป็นหน้ากาก มันดีน่ะ เท่ดี มีหน้า กากไม่ค่อยเยอะหรอก ใครจะซื้อ ก็ ซื้อไปน่ะ ไม่ได้บังคับ ให้ซื้อ หรือ ไม่ให้ซื้อ DLC original soundtrack ผมไม่รู้น่ะว่ามันคืออะไร หาข้อมูลเอาเองน่ะ ถ้าใครพึ่งซื้อ เกมนี้ แนะนำ อัปเลเวล ตัว MEG thomas ให้ถึง 15 แล้ว ตัว claudete morel (ตัว ละคร ที่เป็น ผู้หญิง ดำๆ) ให้อับเวลตัวนี้ให้ถึง 15 เหมือนกัน ตัว meg thomas เนี่ย หา Perk วิ่งเร็ว เองน่ะ จำไม่ได้ว่ามาตอนเลเวลไหน ส่วน ตัว ผู้หญิง ดำ เนี่ย ให้อับเวลถึง 15 จะมี Perk รักษา ตัวเองอยู่ อับเลย แนะนำ 2 Perk นี้ สำคัญ มาก และจำเป็นมากด้วย สำหรับ คนที่เริ่มเล่น ก็ ขออธิบาย แค่นี้ล่ะกัน เอ๊ะเดี๋ยวๆ อย่าพึ่ง ขอเตือนไว้ก่อน อย่าไปยุ่ง กับ ไฟล์เกมนี้เลย หรือ ไป ปรับแต่ง ไฟล์เกมนี้ เนี่ย โอกาสสสสสส สูงง มากกกกกกกก ที่จะโดนแบน เล่นเกมนี้ อย่า โกง แต้มน่ะ โกง โดน แบนชัวร์ 10000000000000% เค ก็ ขอ อธิบายเกมนี้แค่นี้จะไปเล่นเกมต่อ >_<

เกมนี้เล่นกับเพื่อนจะสนุกมากกว่า เล่นคนเดียว 2-3 เดือนก็เบื่อแล้ว ผมเล่น2เดือนก็ไปมองเกมอื่นแล้ว
โดยรวม ระบบการเล่นถือว่าดี(และแน่นอนว่าจะอัพเดตไปเรื่อยๆ) แต่บัคก็ยังถือว่าเยอะอยู่ ทั้งนี้ทั้งนั้นจะซื้อหรือไม่ขึ้นอยู่กับคุณเลยครับ เกมนี้ผมให้ผ่านครับแต่ถ้าเล่นระยะยาว 5-6 เดือนขอไม่จะดีกว่า(ระบบการเล่นมันซ้ำซากเกินไป ปั่นไฟ-ออก-ลงหลุมออก วนหลูบไปเรื่อยๆ)

Çok iyi, çok. Oyunu 2017'den beri severek oynuyorum. Bunca yıldır benim için oyunun tek kusuru oyun yapımcılarının oyuncu kitleyi takmamasıydı ancak geçtiğimiz günlerde bir ilk yaşandı. Oyun yapımcıları ilk kez oyuncu kitlesini dinleyerek oyunu dengeleycek bir güncelleme getirdi. Dead hard'ı nerflediler (çok önceden yapılmalıydı). Survivorların çok fazla third chance perk'i var, bu durum dead hard ile birleşince çok daha fena oluyordu. Her hata yaptıklarında dead hard atarak işin içinden sıyrılabiliyorlardı. Ancak onlar bunu gördü ve perk'i reworklediler. Şimdiye kadar vermiş oldukları en doğru tercih olabilir. Ayriyetten Stranger Things dlc'si lisans sorunlarından dolayı oyundan kaldırılmıştı, alamayanlar üzülmüştü. Ancak yapımcılar oyuncu kitleyi gene dinledi ve dlc'yi geri getirmeye karar verdi. Bu jestler üst üste gelince oyuna olan perspektifim değişti ve yorum yapmaya karar verdim.

Not: Şu an da 99 TL verilmez, indirimlerde 39 TL'ye düşüyor.

Меняю свой обзор на отрицательный, почему, да потому что меня эта игра достала в корень уже... Меня просто бесит отношение разработчиков к этой игре, что там к игре, к самим даже игрокам получается. Эта не игра, эта свалка с кучей багов в самой игре, даже в меню, она постоянно виснет, при заходе на сервер опять же виснет, и ничего уже не сделаешь, только если перезапустить, и снова может зависнуть в элементарном меню минут через 10-20. Постоянно что то обновляется, что они там обновляют не понятно, в игре ничего абсолютно не менятся. Ах да, постоянно втюхивают и выпускают какие то сраные DLC, да в одно место себе их засуньте, она голая кое как работает, а с DLC вообще взорвется. Игру полностью нужно дорабатывать, чтобы не трепала нервы, не виснула хотябы в меню и при заходе на сервер. Конечно, в самой игре тоже куча недочетов очень существенных, которых замучаешься перечислять, просто плюнул на нее и снес эту помойку со своего ноутбука. Не берите это унылое глючное ГОВНО, она не стоит 500р, она и 50 не стоит с таким отношением, не говоря уж про какие то DLC у них брать. Классную идею игры, просто утопили в болоте.

7.5\10

I think this game is a great feat in the world of multiplayer cooperation. It has the most balanced skill low to skill cap ratio of player to player I've seen with low tier killers going great against low tier survivors vise versa to high tiers. Sadly no dedicated servers but still holds up nicely. 

Pro's: Developers still working on big updates and bugfixes.
Active community.
Entertaining and great replayability with skill cap always being able to be raised.
A game reliant on player (survivor and killer) error encourages those to become as good as possibile keeping the community vast in it's skill level and abundent in players.
The game can geniuenly cause great fear to the survivors and satisfaction to the killer which creates a thrill in each game.
The soundtrack is great and each song fits perfectly to the situation(to the point where the song playing fits so well you don't even notice it at times{also a con check last con}.

Con's:Many players complaining about balance issues likely due to map design and a perk or two.
Game needs polish when it comes to some of it's core mechanics.(flashlights useless if killer knows to drop survivor instantly after brought to bleeding state)(Killers getting stuck in pallets)The list could go a bit further beyond than just this...sadly.
The soundtrack as said above is great but at times I feel it is playing too quietly for me to appreciate it and for it to do its job of installing fear into me as a survivor and make me feel truly unstoppable as a killer.(Hopefully a feature to increase and decrease the volume within a certain margin without muting it will be added) When listening to the soundtrack on youtube there are so many details shallowed out by other sounds that the real power the soundtrack delivers is missed.

Overview: This game is a 100% worth buying and I don't regret a single hour I have put in. Even with my current 281 hours as of this review I have much to master and learn still. I hope this review helpes you decide wether or not to buy this game

I originally reviewed this game on January 2017 as a rank 20 very annoyed by the bugs and waiting literally 30 minutes to an hour for every match. Ever since my first few hours playing DBD on Steam I have played hundreds of hours of DBD on Playstation 4 as a purple/red rank survivor and green rank killer(yes I'm bad at killing I know). To this day I'm still playing it consistently with friends on PS4 and sometimes my siblings. Despite the bugs that are still annoying to this day this game is just plain fun most of the time. Your experience is different each match but generally it's pretty fun. You will have an occasional match with extremely toxic people who do shit like bodyblocking you or leading the killer right to you, but overall the matches are fun if you have competent teammates. I also have to give Behaviour credit for constantly releasing DLC. Some of the DLC is better than others, some of them were downright horrible[spoiler](*cough*legion*cough*)[/spoiler], but I appreciate that we get new content all the time even when said content isn't always good and may or may not have shit perks. This game has changed immeasurably since my review in 2017. It's actually slowly becoming somewhat balanced. It used to be bully the killer simulator every match where survivors would just point at the killer at the exit gate, tbag 30 times, and leave. But with all of the changes that have been made in countless updates killers actually have a chance to have a decent game. There are still toxic pieces of shit but there always will be and it's not half as toxic as it was back then. Without the constant bugs this game would be golden. If you're willing to deal with bugginess and a healthy dose of toxicity then chances are you'll have fun playing this game just as I did after graduating from rank 20. Don't write a review after only a few hours of playing like I did, your experience is much different at high ranks with competent teammates and once you learn to actually pallet loop and survive for longer than 10 seconds you'll start having fun. I remember playing swf with a few friends who were rank 20 and they were fucking amazed when I could pallet loop and survive a chase for longer than 5 seconds. They were calling me a "champ" through the mic even though I was only green ranks at the time and wasn't even playing that well, if that doesn't tell you how different your experience is in your first few hours as a rank 20 I don't know what will. I highly recommend playing swf because playing solo is like rolling the dice, you have no idea if your teammates will be good. To summarize:

[b][u]Pros[/u][/b]
- Fun and addicting once you can actually play
- Devs constantly release new DLC including killers, survivors, maps, outfits, etc.
- Great game to play with friends

[b][u]Cons[/u][/b]
- Constant bugs, when updates come out they just seem to get replaced by new bugs(to be fair the game isn't as buggy as it used to be, but it can still interfere with your gameplay experience sometimes)
- Toxic players, although it's usually just a bit of tbagging and not people who are being total dicks
- Long queue times that seem to take longer and longer the higher your rank is, sometimes I want to play a quick match and I end up just going to bed because the matchmaking takes so long

That just about sums it up. If you're new to DBD then you're lucky, it was way worse back then and despite the flaws you should give it a chance.

Absolutely stunning game that's come a long way since it first released in 2016. When the game first released it was terribly one-sided to survivors, but over the years it has become very balanced. Currently, I am sitting at about 2900 hours, and cannot wait to put more time into the game. Nearly every patch and DLC release pushed the game in a positive direction and it's amazing that the developers are able to do that. Considering this is an asymmetrical horror game, it is VERY hard to do so. As with most games, the community is slightly toxic at times. Many reviews state that this game is unbalanced and that everything is wrong with it. This is not the case. Most people who are saying those kinds of things have barely anytime in the game, and were not around to see what a true unbalanced and nightmare this game could be, as it was in 2016. Highly recommended, and I wouldn't trade the time, friendships, and experiences this game has given me for anything! 11/10

November 2021 Edit: Still great.

I notice many of the top reviews stating this game is horribly bugged. I have had a few frustrating moments with the game and broken loading screens, however in my short playtime as of late I find that the bugs do not seriously detract from the overall game experience. I have had quite a good amount of fun as both Survivor and Killer. Some things, such as not having enough perks due to low level to counter some strategies, have been mildy frustating, but forgivable. Overall the game is decent but could improve from some devotion to fixing the netcode and frame rate issues.
Good game

I saw a trailer for Dead by Daylight and showed it to my daughter. (Don't judge me she is 15) and she loved it. It was priced cheap so I got it to see if it would be fun to play. Usually I research games before purchasing, been burned a few times ya know. 

We were going in blind.

I wanted a single player mode or at least bots to let her play without having to go full multiplayer on our "first" game together because I was a little bit worried that there would be lobby chat that was too icky. You know what I mean, once the internet knows there is a girl on the other end of the line, some people perv out. So actually having no comms was a good thing for us. I know there is an after game chat but that is mostly used for "gg" comments or for whiny trolls to come out from under their bridges. ( hey trolls gotta eat )  

Now I am so old school that when I downloaded Doom the first time it meant that I couldn’t get any calls on my landline and was only getting 2400 baud. If you don’t know what I mean you are young. Me, I am old. I played all the old FPS games (which we called doom clones) So I didn’t think I'd be too into this little horror game. Even though it plays first and third person.

I loaded it just to make sure that the game played in both killer and survivor modes. I assumed there would be a single player mode or training levels but no. After a few min in game I realized I didn’t need it. Now that I saw how the game was set up I realized that I was actually interested in giving it a fair chance. But I bought it for her and didn’t want to spoil the fun of learning the game together. I was ready to hand the controls to her and I wasn't sure what to expect. 

Here is where things got interesting. 

I've talked about me so let me just say that my daughter is a happy person who loves her puppy and gives hugs to her parents just because. Now she doesn’t have the pigtails and skip to school like a suburban weirdo, but she doesn’t have black fingernails and write death poems either. 

So think of well-rounded girl who so far has mostly played Mario cart on her Wii and who has a slightly unhealthy affection for Freddy Kruger. You know, normal. 

Things started off on the right foot when she first selected the hillbilly because he had a chainsaw. I think she said something about being like Ash from the evil dead, but maybe I just thought that myself. 

The game isn’t perfect by a long shot. There is no matchmaking or servers that I can select from. There is no choice on which maps get selected for a match and when first getting started you have no powerups at all. But hey she doesn't know what isn’t there because she hasn't played this kind of game before. 

Starting a new multiplayer she was also worried that she would get killed quick. She has seen daddy play his games and that’s what it’s like being me online. (remember I'm old) but she did well and before the first game was even over she was having a ball. She was running around and taunting the survivors with a lil song she made up.
“I’m gonna hit you with my hammer… I’m gonna kill you with my chainsaw.” It was hilarious.

The rest of the family was downstairs and they heard us singing and laughing. They wandered upstairs and took in the view of her singing a little ditty like it was just the most obvious thing for a hillbilly killer to do. Shaking their heads, they went back to episodes of friends or League of Legends or Minecraft while we went on slaughtering twenty somethings like it was hunting season.

Now we both share the game and if you ever see big skinny out there in the dark, usually as Michael Myers. It could be a sweet little girl singing a song as she tortures you and impales you on a hook. She is a bit of a camper and enjoys watching them squirm. 

I think I’ll get Carmageddon next. That game could always use another good driving song. And she is going to be 16 soon.
Pretty good job so far

首先我是一名跟风玩家，我很早便入手了这个游戏，一个被主播带起来的游戏.那时候没有中文，我迷茫很久，不知道点什么.靠着摸索也只能到15段。这之间我也吸了不少粉。后来血网越来越重要，不得已下汉化了。并且在一段时间内成功游戏。再到后来中文出了以后，我再登陆游戏却收到了vac封禁消息，我没有尝试去找客服，因为汉化毕竟修改了内容.上面是我停止游戏的理由下面是对游戏的评价
环境效果非常好，乌鸦声呼吸声还有心跳，非常棒。身临其境的感觉。刚开始玩很恐怖，一滴滴血印在屏幕上。但是可能是刚刚开发的原因，bug非常多，透视卡到改存档，一盘非常快就结束的多半是透视！车库那里bug特别多，有次打水友赛连卡3个，万人直播很尴尬的！还有就是刷分的，甚至看到公然刷分。幸好举报机制出现，可能会抓到一些，但如今淘宝上还在售卖防封外挂.希望可以制止，还大家一个公平游戏

The devs have recently thrown a few patches at the game and I must say that it's been very positive so far.  Firstly, the lobby simulator seems to be of very little issue now.  There is a delay when playing with friends on Steam that could be addressed but it's a much better experience overall.  The graphical changes have been great too and the whole game feels different but in a good way.  Definitely recommended and good fun with friends.
